name: Simple Machines (fatjosephina)
description:
Pulley Penelope

How To Play:

- Move with WASD or Arrow Keys

- Press Spacebar to grab

- Press ESC or P to pause

- Rapidly press WASD or Arrow keys to escape

- At the end, click on the win button to play again

Version 0.3 (current) available to play in browser. Version 0.1 and Version 0.2 available for download.

Joseph Poselenzny
